column6:
Peter Parker, a.k.a. SPIDER-MAN, is having a hard time concentrating in school: he's got to worry about a grumpy teacher, an angry bully, and the ultimate in pest-control - THE SPIDER-SLAYER! How can SPIDER-MAN defeat the relentless robot when Peter Parker's supposed to be in class?,2007,4
32 PGS./All Ages ...$2.99
column8: | colorist:Guru-eFX | writer:Chris Kipiniak | inker:Roland Paris | penciller (cover):Patrick Scherberger | letterer:Dave Sharpe
